amendment.description: Amendment sought to modernize and reform the sugar program by removing barriers to domestic production and implementing market reforms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-679 to modernize and reform the sugar program by removing barriers to domestic production and implementing market reforms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 278 (Roll no. 193).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Foxx.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 278 (Roll no. 193).
